name: Jailor
description:
Take the role of a jailor and try to keep alive humanity's worst individuals. 

  • WASD / Arrow keys for movement
  • Use the buttons to request food, water or meds for your prisoners
  • Deliver them by pushing the crates to the designated areas

Made from 10/04/2020 to 17/04/2020 for 8 Bits to Infinity - Easy Jam and Weekly Challenge #2 

The 2d "art" can be freely downloaded at: 

https://opengameart.org/content/8bit-simple-jail

Music by Wolfgang:

https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-cave-loop

Font by Zaydek MG:

https://www.dafont.com/es/8-bit-1-6.font

(if the game looks choppy on your browser, try the downloadable version)
